update pcms_project set REQUEST_TITLE = #{requestTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DETAIL_ACCOUNT = #{detailAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_COMPANY_CODE = #{requestCompanyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DETAIL_SUBJECT = #{detailSubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_DEPT = #{requestDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_USER = #{requestUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_TELPHONE = #{requestTelphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_EMAIL = #{requestEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_INFO = #{requestInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, request_user_name = #{requestUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, finance_user = #{financeUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, finance_user_name = #{financeUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_CREATE_TIME = #{requestCreateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_END_TIME = #{requestEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTIVITY_STORE = #{activityStore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOP_CRM_CODE = #{shopCrmCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTIVITY_CITY = #{activityCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOP_LEVEL = #{shopLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOP_BRANCH = #{shopBranch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOP_CHANNEL = #{shopChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DETAIL_TASK = #{detailTask,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOP_SALES_AMOUNT = #{shopSalesAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CURRENCY = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXCHANGE = #{exchange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, balance = #{balance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT a.REQUEST_ID AS requestId, a.REQUEST_TITLE AS requestTitle, a.TYPE, a.DETAIL_ACCOUNT AS detailAccount, a.request_user_name AS requestUserName, a.REQUEST_COMPANY_CODE AS requestCompanyCode, a.REQUEST_DEPT AS requestDept, a.finance_user_name AS financeUserName, a.DETAIL_SUBJECT AS detailSubject, a.REQUEST_CREATE_TIME AS requestCreateTime, a.REQUEST_END_TIME AS requestEndTime, b.SHOP_NAME AS shopName, b.SHOP_CRM_CODE AS shopCrmCode, b.SHOP_PROVINCE, b.SHOP_CITY, b.SHOP_COUNTY, b.SHOP_LEVEL, b.SHOP_BRANCH, b.SHOP_CHANNEL, b.SHOP_SALES_AMOUNT FROM pcms_project a LEFT JOIN pcms_shop b ON a.SHOP_CRM_CODE=b.SHOP_CRM_CODE WHERE a.REQUEST_ID = #{requestId}
